hero.title: Maximilien Rouillon Zhu
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer
hero.description: Crafting innovative web solutions with modern technologies.

project1.name: Bingosrs - OSRS Bingo Card
project1.description: A Bingo Card tool for OSRS events, designed to track progress, color-code tiles, mark completions, add notes, and stay organized and motivated throughout the event.

project2.name: Search Algorythm
project2.description: An optimized seach engine for a recipe page with detailed documentation

project3.name: Marieke's online Workshop
project3.description: Marieke's online workshop is a web application that allows users to book workshops, view the workshop schedule, and get in touch with Marieke.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with a keen interest in creating innovative web solutions. With expertise in modern technologies, I strive to build scalable and efficient applications that solve real-world problems. When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new tech, gaming, or travelling the world and its cuisine.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.name: Name
contact.successDescription: Thank you for your message. I'll get back to you soon!
contact.quote: Let's collaborate and build something amazing together. Your next great web app is just a message away!

footer.name: Maximilien Rouillon Zhu
footer.builtWith: Built with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui
